channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocked pavement, 5th September
item.description:
Pavement is blocked by road diversion sign meaning I have yo go in the road in my wheelchair endangering my safety. Pavement other side of the road cannot be used due to the camber of the pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burnhill Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 5th September
item.description:
Photos say it all, fences, fridges and rubbish.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Champion Road, Perry Vale, London

item.title: Sofa Dumped corner of Friern Barnet Lane and A1000, 5th September
item.description:
Sofa Dumped corner of Friern Barnet Lane and A1000. Please can it be removed? Thank you.

item.title: Rubbish on the path leading to Albany park, 5th September
item.description:
People are always throwing rubbish here. It is on bradley road. On the path that leads to Albany park.

item.title: Flytipped White goods dumped behind garages, 5th September

item.title: Rubbish isn't being collected!!, 5th September
item.description:
This is a health and safety hazard and its also making it difficult for us to get in and out of our building - please can this be collected ASAP?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5-7, John Prince's Street, Fitzrovia, Camden Town, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: E bikes blocking access to anchor mews, 5th September
item.description:
Again, e bike users are parking their bikes incorrectly and inconsiderately. On Hazelbourne road bikes are always parked outside of the designated space - and this morning there were lots of bikes blocking access to Anchor Mews. This is not good enough. E-bike companies need to be held to account

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelbourne Road, Clapham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excess leaves need clearing outside 49 Beatrice Road as blocking drain, 5th September
item.description:
Excess leaves need clearing outside 49 & 51 Beatrice Road as blocking drain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beatrice Road, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Berries and leaves never cleared, 5th September
item.description:
A tree outside my house sheds berries and leaves and it is NEVER cleared or swept by the street cleaner. They seem to stop after Waitrose. Not only is it unsightly but the berries become slippery particularly after rainfall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Johns Road, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More flytipping by residents of Chai Walk, 5th September
item.description:
Chai Walk is owned by Agudas Israel and their residents constantly fly tip despite the visible sign saying not to. No one is ever held accountable. Please do something other than just collecting the illegally dumped rubbish! They are not above the law.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mount Pleasant Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A table has been left on the street, 5th September
item.description:
I’ve come out of my home to a large table left outside my door! It’s an obstruction to the wall way and my entry to home

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Rodwell Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog poo everywhere, 5th September
item.description:
Dog poo everywhere on the surrounding streets. Counted 15 on ravenscroft / Pelham this morning. It feels like there isn't regular street cleaning in this area and it's left until it builds up and gets reported
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ravenscroft Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole on roundabout, 5th September
item.description:
Increasingly large pothole on the roundabout causing a manhole cover to start to sink, this causes drivers to swerve and will cause an accident sooner or later, its also very dangerous for suspension, wheels, cyclists and motorbike/moped drivers.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Townley Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Esterbrooke street sign removed / missing, 5th September
item.description:
The esterbrooke street sign on corner of chapter street (on hide tower garden wall) has been removed/stolen and needs to be replaced.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Esterbrooke Street, Millbank, London
Report on FixMyStreet
